News.headline: Loan Update: 21st February 2017
News.short_description: Update on Daggers Loan players Hyde, Heard, Shepherd, Barnwell and Berkowicz
News.description:
Midfielder Tyrique Hyde started for Whitehawk FC on Saturday in their 2-1 away loss to Maidenhead in the Vanarama National League South. The midfielder played 60 minutes in the game before being replaced by another Daggers loanee, defender Jimmy Shepherd.

Striker Joe White started as a lone forward for Weladstone FC on Saturday in their 1-0 away win over Margate in the Vanarama National League South, with the forward playing the full 90 minutes.

Midfielder Scott Heard also played the full 90 minutes for East Thurrock United in their 2-1 home win over Hampton & Richmond Borough in the Vanarama National League South.

Striker Shomari Barnwell played the full 90 minutes for Bishopâ€™s Stortford in their 4-1 home defeat to Poole Town in the Vanarama League South.

Lastly forward Jakub Berkowicz started the game for Barkingside FC in their 3-2 away win over Haringey & Waltham in the Essex County League.
